name: Ski-Ball (Kristjan G.)
description:
This is a game exploring frictionless skiing mechanics known from games in the FPS-Z genre, in 2D, where players can switch between skiing on 3 different tracks. 

Catch the orange circle, and hold on to it to win.

Player 1: A for track switch, S for jetpack.

Player 2: K for track switch, L for jetpack.

WebGL version has performance problems and sound is buggy, so for the full experience, grab the Windows zip.
